HOME.name: Mustapha Iderkaoui
HOME.title: Full-stack developer
HOME.highlight: Scalable. Modern. Maintainable. I turn ideas into clean, flexible code — and I love every part of it.
HOME.about_1: I'm focused on building scalable, performance-driven websites that deliver great user experiences. I work with technologies like React for modern frontend development and Node.js to power reliable backend systems. Clean code, accessibility, and maintainability are always at the core of what I build.
HOME.about_2: I also pay attention to SEO fundamentals — and I know how to organize projects in Next.js to support better visibility, structure, and performance across search engines.
HOME.location: Based in Agadir, Morocco · 2+ years of self-taught & academic full-stack development.

EXPERINCE.introduction: During my first training experience at Développeur-informatique.ma, I gained valuable skills and insights that shaped my development approach. Here are some key takeaways:
EXPERINCE.title: My First Training Experience at

sections.subtitle: Git & Version Control
sections.content: Gained hands-on experience managing repositories, handling merges, and resolving code conflicts.

sections.subtitle: Team Collaboration
sections.content: Learned the importance of working in a team, sharing ideas, and ensuring smooth communication.

sections.subtitle: Website Security
sections.content: Contributed to increasing the security of the website, ensuring a safer user experience.

sections.subtitle: Code Optimization
sections.content: Focused on creating scalable, efficient code while simplifying and improving performance.

sections.subtitle: Improved French Language Skills
sections.content: Enhanced my communication in a bilingual work environment.

sections.subtitle: Problem-Solving & Professionalism
sections.content: Developed strong problem-solving skills and learned how to stay professional in a workplace setting.

CONCLUSION.subtitle: Conclusion
CONCLUSION.content: This training has provided me with a strong foundation in web development, teamwork, and professionalism, which I continue to build on as I progress in my career.

EXPER2.title: Freelance Experience - E-commerce Project
EXPER2.introduction: I joined an online freelance team to develop an e-commerce website for a store specializing in phones and electronics. This remote project allowed me to work on both the development and UI design, using Figma to craft clean, user-friendly interfaces aligned with the client's brand. Through this experience, I improved my time management, participated in regular meetings, delivered tasks on time, and communicated directly with the client to ensure their needs were met efficiently and professionally.
key_takeaways: Gained experience working remotely in a freelance team.
Learned how to manage and respect meeting schedules and deadlines.
Delivered tasks efficiently while maintaining quality.
Communicated directly with clients to understand their needs and feedback.
Contributed to UI/UX design using Figma, enhancing the user interface and overall experience.
Improved self-discipline and accountability in a remote work setting.

EXPER3.title: Personal Commitment to Growth
EXPER3.introduction: Over the past two years at ISTA Agadir, I've taken a proactive approach to my development as a full-stack developer. While my formal education provided a foundation, I recognized early on that true mastery required daily dedication beyond the classroom.
EXPER3.body: Each day, I engaged in self-directed learning—exploring new technologies, building projects, and deepening my understanding of both front-end and back-end development. This consistent effort has not only enhanced my technical skills but also fostered a mindset of continuous improvement and adaptability.
